Posts.EditableText:
I just realised that this particular forum has a significant shortage of on-topic posts. So figured I should present you all a question that's been burning at the back of my mind.

Two big bads, with both powers of their own and forces under their command. Who would win in a <s title="Come on, neither of these two is ever going to fight fair">fair*</s> fight? You might think General Zod is almost unbeatable, given the whole invulnerability thing. He's certainly stronger. But he's also (in most incarnations) solar powered. Get him away from Earth, and he's at a major disadvantage. And he seems to have something of a knack for getting tricked into situations where he loses his powers.

I think it could go either way. What do you think?
And if those two were somehow fighting for the fate of Earth, who would you _want_ to win?

Yeah, but Grievous has a tendency to lose all those lightsabers he's been collecting.  And to die by blaster?  That's just weak.

Posts.EditableText:
Zod is a "superman", but without sunlight he's just a man (without lightsabers and without the use of the force), and Grievious is just a robot.

Zod as "superman" wins every time, Grievious wins every time against Zod as an ordinary man

------

Zod the Immortal (from Berserk manga/anime) pwns both Zod and Grievious, hehe

Zod is just a "wanna be" and plagerizer of Nataru (who's an ajoran, can't spell, genetic super warrior aliens, who's able to teleport and go back in time, as well as super strength and speed) from Birdy the Mighty Decode anime: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qZjbNhLODKU

-----

HK wants to see Samus Aran (from Metroid) kill/pwn everyone in star wars, hehe :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tsybyYxOywA (Samus Aran doesn't need the force, she's Chozo trained, grins)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EcZCZ8ZNHMc (Samus Aran doesn't need the force, she's Chozo trained, grins)
